name: Escape From Arkham City
description:
Four-player local multiplayer game in which players try to collect all ingredients for a bomb to blow a hole through the walls of Arkham City prison, without being subdued by Batman.

Created for Columbia College Chicago's Game Design I course - the assignment was to convert an existing video game (our choice was Batman: Arkham City) into a physical tabletop game (we chose to make it into a game in the Hidden Movement genre), then convert that game back into a digital game.
